title: Will I get banned for using curse voice?  Rioter please confirm!
body: Just found out about this program, I've heard that its recently become legal, but I still want a rioter to confirm.

replies.body: Yeah u go to prison if u use it

IF you use curse, bikies will burn down your tattoo parlor. 

If you dont have one, they'll make you set one up, then they'll burn THAT down.
I have it so I see no reason why whatsoever
its perfectly fine. hard to find people using it now, other than trick2g subs
